name: P.Ackman
description:
Welcome to E1L1.

A subterranean station located inside of an asteroid called E1L1, which is inside the Oort Cloud. One of the oldest known to man. Created by Jim Octothorpe, the 4th richest man, Octothorpe Consortium Aerosapce (OCA) has built E1L1 to begin investigation and mining of a mineral called, Uranium Monodex Fentanyl.

OCA has hired, Philip Ackman, a middle aged Janitor to take care of the station when things get messy, and knowing how E1L1 is handled, everyone is a slob.

In 2081, an unknown incident took place inside of the station, no one knows what happened or what happened to the scientist and workers in there. Philip Ackman is the station's only hope for recovery, can he do it?
